Title: Establishes the prohibition against requiring a permit for the singing of the national anthem or the reciting of the pledge of allegiance
Summary: Establishes the prohibition against requiring a permit for the singing of the national anthem or the reciting of the pledge of allegiance.
LawCode: Add ยง20-h, Gen City L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general city law, in relation to establishing the prohibition against requiring a permit for the singing of the national anthem or the reciting of the pledge of allegiance
